a0.speaker: Reimu:
a0.dialogue: Man, that storm made me all wet. What is all behind this?

a1.dialogue: The Great Master has conjured up the storm. Her powers become stronger every time a tempest is stirred up.

a2.speaker: Reimu:
a2.dialogue: You look like you are one of those heterodox people that I met a while ago, based on what's printed on your apron.

a3.speaker: Kaori:
a3.dialogue: Hey, don't call me a heterodox!

a4.speaker: Kaori:
a4.dialogue: For I, a believer of a true God, the Great Narukami Ouki has blessed Gensokyo with this paradisiacal concert.

a5.speaker: Reimu:
a5.dialogue: So, you are one of those people. I will never go to a place hosted by heretics.

a7.speaker: Reimu:
a7.dialogue: P... Please cool down, lil' one!

a8.speaker: Kaori:
a8.dialogue: For the price of calling us heretics, my blessings to people shall turn into a curse for you!
